name: Heet Sakaria
about: Experienced Public Relations Officer with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry. Skilled in WordPress, Public Speaking, Marketing, Robotics, and Web Development. Strong media and communication professional with a Bachelor of Engineering focused in Information Technology from K J Somaiya College of Engineering Vidyavihar, Mumbai
